div.head: Test for parallel segmentation app
div.p: etena yad uktaṃ kaṇikāyāṃ yadi kulālādīnāṃ katipayopakaraṇādijñānam, na samastopakaraṇādijñatā, tarhi tenaiva nidarśanena īśvarasyāpi | tadupakaraṇādimātrajñānam | tanmātrajñāne na sarvajñatāsiddhiḥ tadupakaraṇādimātrajñāne na sarvajñatāsiddhiḥ | katipayajño hi tathā sati syāt |
